snippet: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak at the China Open to 21 straight matches, beating Vasek Pospisil, 6-3, 7-5, under the roof on center court on a cold, rainy day in Beijing.
abstract: Novak Djokovic extends his winning streak at the China Open to 21 straight matches, beating Vasek Pospisil.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak at the China Open to 21 straight matches, beating Vasek Pospisil, 6-3, 7-5, under the roof on center court on a cold, rainy day in Beijing.

headline.main: Djokovic Wins in Beijing to Extend Streak at China Open
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Extends Streak at China Open
